If y ou’re instructed t o choose a f eat fr om a speciﬁc categor y, such as the Origin categor y, that categor y must appear under the f eat’s name. If a pr erequisite includes a class, y ou must ha ve at least 1 le vel in that class t o tak e the feat. Beneﬁt. The beneﬁts of a f eat ar e detailed after any pr erequisites ar e listed. If y ou ha ve a f eat, y ou gain its beneﬁts. Repeatable. A feat can be tak en only once unless its description states other wise in a “Repeatable ” subsection.
